problem.heading: The Problem
problem.title: Physical Love Locks Are Destroyed
problem.description: Since 2015, the City of Paris has removed all physical love locks from the Pont des Arts. The weight of over 700,000 locks threatened the bridge's structural integrity. Today, attaching physical locks is illegal and they are systematically cut and destroyed.
problem.impact: Thousands of love stories lost forever...

solution.heading: The Solution
solution.title: Your Eternal Virtual Love Lock
solution.description: Welcome to the only legal, ecological, and permanent way to immortalize your love on the Pont des Arts. Our virtual bridge preserves your love story forever, accessible from anywhere in the world.

legal.title: 100% Legal
legal.description: Fully compliant with Paris city regulations

eternal.description: Your lock will never be cut or removed
